webShareApiNotAvailable: Sharing is not available in this browser
welcomeDescription: You can start using TubeTalk right away with your own API key from OpenRouter or OpenAI (usage will be billed to your account).
step1CreateKey: Visit one of the links above to create your API key
step3PasteKey: Click the settings icon âš™ and paste your key
tutorialDescription: TubeTalk helps you analyze YouTube video transcripts using AI. Here's how to use it:
tutorialStep1: Go to any YouTube video that has closed captions/subtitles available
tutorialStep2: Press Alt+Y or click the TubeTalk extension icon to open the sidebar
tutorialStep3: The AI will automatically analyze the video transcript and provide insights
tutorialStep4: Ask questions about the video content to get AI-powered responses
tutorialNote: Note: TubeTalk only works on YouTube video pages with available transcripts. Navigate to a video page to start using TubeTalk!
noTranscriptMessage: No transcripts available for this video. Please try a different video.
dataAccessError: Sorry, I cannot access the video transcript at the moment. Please try again.
contentModerationError: This content was flagged by a moderation system and cannot be processed. Please try a different video.
tokenLimitExceededError: This video is too long to process at the moment. Support for longer videos is coming soon.
duplicateModelError: This model is already in the list
settings_model_duplicate: This model has already been added
pleaseWaitStreamingMessage: Please wait until streaming is complete
